mapper.select: SELECT a.lxseq, a.lxnum, a.lxname, b.coxname, a.lxlink, a.lxfile, count(c.qxseq) qxcnt, b.coxname FROM lecture a LEFT OUTER JOIN quiz c ON a.lxseq = c.lxseq , course b WHERE a.coxseq = #{coxseq} AND a.coxseq = b.coxseq GROUP BY a.lxseq, a.lxnum, a.lxname, b.coxname, a.lxlink, a.lxfile, b.coxname ORDER BY a.lxnum asc
SELECT cxseq, cxgubun, cxcode, cxname FROM code WHERE cxseq is not null and cxgubun = '003' ORDER BY cxseq asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture (lxnum, lxname, lxfile, regdate, coxseq, mxseq, lxtype, lxlink) VALUES (#{lxnum}, #{lxname}, #{fileName}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{coxseq}, #{USEQ}, #{lxtype}, #{lxlink})
mapper.select: SELECT a.axstatus, a.regdate, a.axseq, b.coxname, c.mxname, c.mxid FROM apply a RIGHT OUTER JOIN course b ON a.coxseq = b.coxseq LEFT OUTER JOIN member c ON a.mxseq = c.mxseq WHERE a.coxseq=#{coxseq}
